title: Cameroon Sells $750 Million Dollar Bond After Benin Deal
description: Cameroon sold a dollar-denominated bond for the first time since 2024, less than a week after Benin tapped international markets, as frontier issuers seize on improving investor sentiment.
content: Cameroon sold a dollar-denominated bond for the first time since 2024, less than a week after Benin tapped international markets, as frontier issuers seize on improving investor sentiment.
